name: Nectarines
benefits: Nectarines are stone fruits closely related to peaches but with smooth skin. Rich in vitamins, antioxidants, and fiber. The colorful flesh indicates high carotenoid content. Part of daily fruit serving that supports metabolic health and provides natural sweetness without added sugars.
amount: 2 ripe nectarines, pitted and cut into 1-inch/2.5cm pieces

quotes: 2 ripe peaches or nectarines, pitted and cut into 1-inch/2.5cm pieces
Many popular stone fruits, such as cherries, plums, peaches, nectarines, mangoes and dates, are in season in late summer.
